H0.text: Nuclear power plants and batteries are two of Earth's natural resources.

H1.text: Forests and nuclear power plants are two of Earth's natural resources.

H2.text: Batteries and waterfalls are two of Earth's natural resources.

H3.text: Forests and waterfalls are two of Earth's natural resources.

A4.text: Forests provide a diversity of ecosystem services including converting carbon dioxide into oxygen and biomass.

A5.text: Forests are the largest terrestrial ecosystems of Earth by area, and are found around the globe.
